description: This script initializes a PostgreSQL database schema. It validates prerequisites, reads connection info, applies schema SQL scripts, bootstrap roles and teams, and optionally seeds the database with development data.

methods.name: log
methods.description: Logs informational messages with a prefix.

methods.name: fail
methods.description: Logs an error message and exits the script.

methods.name: apply_sql_if_exists
methods.description: Conditionally applies a SQL file if it exists, logging the process and handling errors.
